identity.name: Magical Kenya Open Digital Platform
principles: Contrast: Deep Greens vs. Hot Reds vs. Bone White

theme.strategy: Warm Luxury (Bone/Sand background instead of sterile white)

primary.description: Deep Kenya Forest Green - Use for primary actions, headers, active states

secondary.description: Magical Red - Use for 'Magical' branding, urgent CTAs, live badges

accent.description: Safari Gold - Use for premium highlights, winners, trophies

grid_modes.tetris: grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-12 gap-4 md:gap-8 auto-rows-[minmax(200px,auto)]

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 h-12 px-8 rounded-none uppercase tracking-widest font-bold text-sm transition-all duration-300 hover:tracking-[0.2em]
buttons.secondary: bg-secondary text-secondary-foreground hover:bg-secondary/90 h-12 px-8 rounded-none uppercase tracking-widest font-bold text-sm
buttons.outline: border-2 border-primary text-primary hover:bg-primary hover:text-primary-foreground h-12 px-8 rounded-none uppercase tracking-widest font-bold text-sm

cards.default: bg-card border border-border/40 shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-all duration-300 rounded-none
cards.glass: bg-white/70 backdrop-blur-xl border border-white/20 shadow-xl rounded-none
cards.feature: group relative overflow-hidden bg-primary text-primary-foreground p-8 rounded-none

inputs.default: h-12 rounded-none border-border focus:ring-2 focus:ring-primary/20 bg-white/50 backdrop-blur-sm

implementation_steps.action: Update index.css with new variables and import fonts (Playfair Display, Barlow Condensed, DM Sans). Add noise texture to body.
Update tailwind.config.js with the 'Magical' color palette and font families.
Create the MainLayout with sticky glass header and 'fat' footer. Implement the 'Tetris' grid system.
Customize Shadcn components (Button, Card, Input) to match the 'Anti-AI' rounded-none, high-spacing aesthetic.
Build Home, Leaderboard, and Registration pages using the defined grid modes and components.

universal_guidelines: DO NOT use default Shadcn radius. Force 'rounded-none' or 'rounded-sm' for a sharp, premium feel.
DO NOT center text by default. Use left alignment for a strong editorial look.
ALWAYS add the noise texture overlay to the body background.
Use 'Playfair Display' for all H1/H2 headings to establish the brand voice.
Ensure all interactive elements have 'data-testid' attributes.
For the Leaderboard, use a dense table layout but with 'Barlow Condensed' fonts for numbers to make it look like a sport scoreboard.
